top.title: Japan votes in snap election as PM Takaichi takes a gamble
top.summary: Observers say Sanae Takaichi's personal popularity may boost the ruling party's showing at the polls.

top.title: Savannah Guthrie says 'we will pay' for mother's safe return
top.summary: "We received your message," the US news anchor says in the latest video plea for the return of her mother Nancy Guthrie, 84, who is believed abducted.

top.title: France investigates ex-minister Jack Lang over Epstein links
top.summary: The socialist grandee quits his role at a prestigious institute as he is investigated for the "laundering of tax-fraud proceeds".

top.title: Baldur's Gate to be turned into TV series - without the game's developers
top.summary: The show will be made by Craig Mazin, who co-created the acclaimed game adaptation The Last Of Us.

top.title: Uber ordered to pay $8.5m over claim driver raped passenger
top.summary: The verdict is expected to influence the outcome of thousands of other cases against the ride hailing firm.

top.title: Google staff call for firm to cut ties with ICE
top.summary: More than 900 Google employees signed a letter opposing company links to federal immigration actions.
